argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | oppcco.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 2 |  | oppcco.c | |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) |
| 3 |  | oppcco.o | |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) |
| 4 |  | oppcco.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 5 |  | oppcco.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 6 |  | oppcco.z | |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_oppccofval | |- ( ph -> ( <. X , Y >. ( comp ` O ) Z ) = tpos ( <. Z , Y >. .x. X ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ph -> ( G ( <. X , Y >. ( comp ` O ) Z ) F ) = ( G tpos ( <. Z , Y >. .x. X ) F ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ovtpos | |- ( G tpos ( <. Z , Y >. .x. X ) F ) = ( F ( <. Z , Y >. .x. X ) G ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( ph -> ( G ( <. X , Y >. ( comp ` O ) Z ) F ) = ( F ( <. Z , Y >. .x. X ) G ) ) |
